summary: San Jose is the biggest city in Northern California by population and size. It's home to over 970,000 people and is known for its tech industry, sunny weather, and diverse communities. Many big tech companies like Cisco and eBay are based there. San Jose was founded in 1777 and became part of Mexico, then the United States. After World War II, it grew quickly and became the capital of Silicon Valley. However, recently, it lost some population and dropped in the city rankings.
title: San Jose, California
